column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We got the Cha Cha Cha and the sprouting up ramen. The pork belly was melt in your mouth DE LIC IOUS. The broth was very tasty
column2: it is not overwhelmed by a super salty taste. You know how some ramen places have super salty broth
column3: this place hits the nail on the head. I am not a huge fan of bamboo shoots but when I found them in my bowl
column4: I decided to give them a try and to my surprise
column5: they were DAMN GOOOOD. This place is definitely not suited for Instagram photos of your food. Remember to bring in a flashlight to take high quality photos. -Quang
